## Client.(constructor)

Creates a new gRPC client instance for accessing the Textile Threads API.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(context?: ContextInterface);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  context | ContextInterface | The context to use for interacting with the APIs. Can be modified later. |
